snippet.title: Poll held on Slough roundabout safety trials
snippet.description:
Berkshire / 10 January 2014
A series of trial road modifications to improve safety at an accident black spot have concluded, with residents being asked which one worked best.

snippet.title: Rugeley miners memorial plan on hold over roundabout safety concerns
snippet.description:
Stoke & Staffordshire / 7 November 2013
Plans to build a memorial to miners in a Staffordshire town are on hold amid safety concerns that the proposed site is a roundabout. Cannock Chase…

snippet.title: Richmond Hill roundabout closed as bridge parts replaced
